name: The Marker Game
description:
One Game a Week 2019 -- Game #3. A turn-based combat game on a hexagonal grid. 

Check out my development blog at www.trykonstudios.com/blog to read more about my game development process!

-------------------------------

CONTROLS

Tab to switch between units

Left Click to move units

Right click to attack

W/A/S/D to pan camera
